game.name: Batman™: Arkham Knight - Prototype Batmobile Skin
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 매끈한 변형 배트모빌로 적을 제압하십시오! 독특하게 설계된 초기형 배트모빌을 타고 빠른 속도로 고담시의 거리를 질주하며 적들을 쓰러뜨리십시오.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Stun your enemies with the slick variant of the Batmobile! The uniquely designed Prototype Batmobile will allow you to tear through the streets of Gotham at rapid speeds and take down your foes.
